title: PRDTR Watch Face
summary: PRDTR Watch Face for Android Wear clock
description: Pimp your watch with predator Watch Face. Use watch face with Classic numbers or learn the Original space language and amaze your friends.FEATURES:- 2in1 Watch Faces with original and classic numbers- 12/24 auto-format- Ambient (dim) battery safe mode- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches SupportINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose predator Watch Face4. Enjoy!The yautja watchface has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
descriptionHTML:
Pimp your watch with predator Watch Face. Use watch face with Classic numbers or learn the Original space language and amaze your friends.

FEATURES:

- 2in1 Watch Faces with original and classic numbers
- 12/24 auto-format
- Ambient (dim) battery safe mode
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose predator Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The yautja watchface has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
comments: Does not work at all i want a refund
More options? If possible can we get the option to disable the background and just have the characters against a black background??
Good idea Low res isn't great though.
You have a great idea, but the lack of high resolution kills it for me.
